You must join the The Telegram Bounty Group‚úÖhttps://t.me/Sharkbounty‚ùáÔ∏èRemember‚ùáÔ∏èüìåThe Shark Chips (SKC)ü¶à are the internal token of the Shark Gaming Casino that you can use to play and win in the different Games of the Platform or Increase your SKC just by holding and getting Rewards through the Shark Grow Systemü§©‚ú®üìåPlease, remind us that you have to join to our Channel to get the instructions You must follow the steps to get the reward. If you don't fill the Bounty Perform List on Friday You'll not be able to get the Shark Chips Coins (SKC)üòï‚ùáÔ∏èImportant‚ùáÔ∏èüìå you can join to our telegram and participate in our telegram Activitiesüé∞üé≤üìåBut if you did both, Your Shark Chips Rewards it Will be Biggerüòéüî•Join and Apply:Payments:Made Every friday until the bounty endsBounty for¬† Altcointalk reply 1000 SkcBounty for telegram join main channel¬† 500 SKCBounty for RT and likes¬† 100 SKCcampaign ends 10/07/2022One user can join both platformsBitcointalk¬† post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404581.msg60474209#msg60474209Telegram: https://t.me/sharkgamingcasinobounty Telegram¬† https://t.me/SharkbountyOne user can join both platformsRequirements to get paid:1: You must join the Telegram and stay there till the end of Launchpad1: an at least 2 month old , twitter ¬†account 2: an Solana Wallet (wallet must be an ¬†Slp Token Supporting. do not use any exchange address)Rules:1: User must stay on the group till the end of Launchpad2: User must be active and supportive in the group. inactive users can get 50% less payrate or can be simply disqualified.3: Using bad language, spamming, advertising any other service in Reality Clash groups not allowed.4: Only one account on each platform allowed. a person found to be cheating by creating multiple accounts will be disqualified.5: Having a 2 month older twitter account is mandatory.. using brand new accounts of these platforms will not be accepted.6: Do not post any Spammy message or confirmation of your joining bounties. Like "Hello, I've Joined" Hi, I am in, Hi, I joined bounty" etc etc,, Only ask valid questions related to the project, reply to answers which you can or want to anser and discuss anything related to the project, but ¬†you don't need to post any hello , hi or any kind of smilly and emojy at the time of joining to prove your membership.
